entry.title: [RFC] Lightning invoice/payment format draft
entry.summary: In a message sent by ZmnSCPxj, an individual is correcting their understanding of the bech32 specification. The character "1" is not allowed in the data part as previously thought. The last "1" digit in the bech32 string serves as a separator between the human-readable and data parts. ZmnSCPxj apologizes for any confusion caused by their previous statement.
